## fragmenter package

A lightweight web design utility that simplifies splitting and wrapping text into individual elements for custom lettering.

## Functions

<table><thead><tr><th>

Function


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[makeFragments(element, granularity, options)](./fragmenter.makefragments.md)


</td><td>

Splits `element.textContent` into graphemes, words, sentences, or lines, and wraps each segment in a new element.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

## Type Aliases

<table><thead><tr><th>

Type Alias


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[CSSClassOrClassFn](./fragmenter.cssclassorclassfn.md)


</td><td>

The CSS class to add to each new element. It can be a simple class name (string) or a function. If it's a function, it receives the segment's index and text content as arguments, and should return a class name or `undefined` to not add any class.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[Granularity](./fragmenter.granularity.md)


</td><td>

Specifies how to split the text.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
